Package com.zanderwohl.chunks.Server

Class SimLoop

java.lang.Object
com.zanderwohl.chunks.Server.SimLoop
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SimLoop
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
The thread that simulates the logic of the game world.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimLoop

      public SimLoop​(java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<com.zanderwohl.console.Message> toConsole, java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<com.zanderwohl.console.Message> fromConsole, int port) throws java.io.IOException, CommandSet.WrongArgumentsObjectException
      The constructor for a new simloop. Currently also acts as its initializer. TODO: Fix this function's documentation. Wait, what's wrong with it?
      Parameters:
      toConsole - The queue of messages to send to the console.
      fromConsole - The queue of messages from the console to be consumed.
      port - The port on which the server should run.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - When the server cannot bind to the port.
      CommandSet.WrongArgumentsObjectException

  • Method Details

    • closeServer

      public void closeServer​(ServerClose quit)
      Close the server, gracefully as possible given the circumstances. Can be used for error closes or non-error closes. Tell all clients about the reason for server close.
      Parameters:
      quit - The server close object that contains a quit reason.

    • getClients

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getClients()
      Gets the list of clients currently connected to the server... please don't use this?
      Returns:
      The list of currently-connected clients.

    • logEvent

      public boolean logEvent​(java.lang.String event)
      An external way to log something with the server loop. VERY expensive, don't use often.
      Parameters:
      event - The string to write to th elog.
      Returns:
      Whether it was successful or not.

    • findClientByDisplayName

      public ClientIdentity findClientByDisplayName​(java.lang.String name)
      Return a client as searched by an exact string match.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      The identity of a particular client.

    • disconnectUser

      public boolean disconnectUser​(ClientIdentity user, java.lang.String reason)
      Disconnects a user from the server gracefully.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to disconnect.
      reason - If active, will tell the user why they were disconnected.
      Returns:
      True if the user was successfully disconnected, false otherwise.

    • addChat

      public void addChat​(Chat c)
      Add a chat item to be sent out to all players. And the console.
      Parameters:
      c - The chat.

    • addClientUpdate

      public void addClientUpdate​(Delta d)
      Enqueue a client update. Will be processed when the simloop has available resources.
      Parameters:
      d - The delta update to enqueue.

    • run

      public void run()
      Run the world. Simulate physics and deal with client updates. Update clients.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
